review: Works great. Love that it runs android os. I have a 3TB hard drive that I have been using to watch movies on my ps3 for awhile now, however more and more my ps3 was giving my cinivi errors, and cutting movies off because I don't "own them" I got this because not only can I watch netflix and prime instant video on this rather than the ps3, but my router has a USB port, so I networked my 3TB hard drive to it, so its accessable over the network, and than sideloaded XBMB onto the firestick and now im watching all my movies wirelessly over my network in HD without anyone butting in saying I don't own them. This was a big issue when I was trying to watch Jurassic World!! It works great on the FireStick!!
